front: How can you enable adaptation at runtime for SAP Fiori Apps?

front: Which system environments offer the UI theme designer?
back: SAP Enterprise Portal, SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP, SAP Business Technology Platform

front: What is the nature of the overview page floorplan?
back: You want to show all information that is needed by the user on a single page, based on a user specific domain or role.

front: In which cases, is a local annotation better than a CDS annotation?
back: Complex UI relevant annotations, You want to use annotations which are not supported by your current ABAP version

front: What ways are there of extending or modifying a SAPUI5 view?
back: View Extension, View Replacement, View Modificaiton

options.A: A UI element has an API
options.B: A UI element does not have a renderer
options.C: A UI element has a renderer
options.D: A UI element can have events

front: What types of extensions/replacements are supported by SAPUI5
back: View Replacement, View modification, Replace Service, Implement UI Controller hooks

front: What are the options for external navigation?
back: Navigation to URL(As a Link), Navigation to intent(As a Link), Navigation to Intent(As a Button)

options.B: BAS is a browser based development environment
options.C: BAS provides application templates as a foundation of highly efficient app development
options.D: BAS is based on an opensource IDE

front: What are the differences between analytical entity set and normal entity set from an OData consumer perspective?
back: Analytical Entity Set: Generates a new field for primary key, returns all data needed to analyze client, analyzes the use of the database and runs faster when SAP HANA is used as database compared to a normal entity set

Which of the following model types are supported by SAPUI5
What are the limitations of publishing CDS as OData service by adding a @OData.publish:true
back: Cannot Change names of entity sets, Only 1 level is taken into consideration when exposing associations, No customized ABAP code in SAP Gateway

front: Which terms are correct when talking about extensibility for SAP applications in a front-end server?
back: SAPUI5 Adaptation/Extension, SAP Fiori Elements Adaptation

front: You want to define a property with the name width to enhance a standard UI5 control. The property should hold the current width of the UI control. What is the best approach to dfining the type of such a property?
back: Define the property width of the type sap.ui.core.CSSSize

back: No value help dialog, Supports fuzzy search, Finda a keyword in multiply fields

front: What steps needs to be done in manifest.json if you need to hide variant function in a list report?
back: Add setting to enable smart Variant Management, Set setting variantManagementHidden to True

front: Which of the following return types are supported by service operations?
Which services are provided by the SAP HANA platform?
back: Application Services, Integration Services, Processing Services, Database Services

front: Which of the following properties are relevant to the type of facet?
When do you not use the overview page floorplan?
back: A high-level or birds-eye view of an application content is sufficient. You want to show information about one object only, in this case use the object page instead. You just represent one application and less than three cards.

front: Avaialbe options for creating a value help for a selection field
back: By adding a foreign key annotation, By adding a value help annotation

front: What is the idea behind the golden rule of having one common UX?
back: Having a common UX reduces training costs and increases the quality of data

front: Steps needed to create an association in CDS and expose it?
back: Declare an association using 'association to' statement, Expose the association by writing its name in projection list

front: How do you set a field as the title for a business entity?
back: Add @UI.headerInfo.title.value for the CDS view and reference it to the field

back: Allows for faster innovation through independently released and serial versions of components, Either automates or provides self-service response

back: Prevent a column selected by user when customizing table settings.

back: Provide a user interface technology for building and adapting client applicaitons, Provide an extensible framework for building desktop and mobile applications

sap.m.SplitAppMode where master is shown inside a popover when in portriat mode

front: What to do implementing your own control renderer?
back: You must implement a class that is derived from sap.ui.core.Renderer, the implementation should use the AMD syntax and it is also necessary to assign the renderer implementation to the renderer property of your UI control implementation.

front: When should you not use the dynamic page layout?
back: You are planning to use SAP fiori elements, such as the list report, analytical list page, overview page, or object page, which already incorporates the dynamic page layout. You want to implement an initial page or object page floor plan these floor plans already incorporate snapping header and footer toolbar features, the behavior is comparable to the dynamic page behavior, but the technical foundation is different. You only need to display a small amount of information, in this case use a dialog instead, if you cannot avoid using the dynamic page layout, use letterboxing to mitigate the issue.

front: Which of the following are key features of SAPUI5?

options.E: Based on open standards such as, JavaScript, CSS3, and HTML5

front: When do you need to work with local data?
back: When working with static data, to perform quick test without creating live entities on the back-end server

front: Which of followin description about search field is NOT true

options.A: The search field is searching on more than one data field
options.B: There is only one search field per list report
options.C: The search field searches for only one data field

front: What steps aer used to display a field as a rating indicator?
back: Set type of line item #AS_DATAPOINT, add a @UI.datapoint to the field and set visualization to #RATING
